comment: As of last update, the app crashes when I try to log in, rendering it mostly useless.

title: Can't Log In
comment: Nexus 5 with Lollipop. Log in fails every time.

title: Disappointed
comment: Was hoping for a lot more. If nothing but a ling to the website when it comes down to it. I couldn't even get it to record  the games i own. I was really hoping it would also recommend similar games based on your collection  but i couldn't  even get off the starting line with it.

title: Needs more work
comment: Not bad, but desperately needs the option to post in the forum and add games to your collection.

title: Can't sync
comment: This app used to be great but since a day or three the app can't load anything anymore, can't sync, can't log etc. Please fix and I will change to 5 stars.

title: Getting worse feature wide
comment: This app has improved drastically since version 1.0 but still needs a lot of work. The latest version looks great with material design layouts but seems to give less information. Many things are just not accessible so you have to resort back to the website but now at least there is a link to it within the app. The play logging is great yet you cannot easily see your comments or ratings still. I do love how it gives you a notification at each game log telling you what number play you're at for the game.

title: Good app, keep improving it please
comment: The new look is fantastic! Nice job. Withholding that last star for collection editing. :) The app makes reading forums and seeing my collection very phone friendly. I would like to be able to add to and edit my collection though. Also, please don't show me the timeout error message until I request more information. Just because I'm not currently getting internet access, there is no reason that I shouldn't be able to finish reading what I've already downloaded. New Internet button in the forums is handy!

title: Won't sync
comment: It's always failing to sync. Plus there is no way to logout of the account you setup originally

title: Decent
comment: Every time I attempt to go to settings, the app stops working and force closes.

title: Bgg
comment: Started out good, only got better. Thank you, devs, for making a really useful app!
Great app. I use it every day for logging my games. Syncs nicely with the website.

title: A Good App
comment: I like this app for browsing my collection and plays. I wish I could browse and add games. Also would like to add plays of games I don't own. For now I use the website. Still a good app though.

title: Poor app
comment: I'm sorry to say that like the websites poor design this app is also poor and missing features. It's a shame that they are so inacessable because the content is absolutely amazing.

title: A long awaited update
comment: The update 5 and updates after that is very refreshing to see.  Great to see some nice tlc given to the app and I really like the locations and players section of the app (and how they allow me to mass rename them).  Keep up the great work.

title: Sync issues but I'm sure it'll improve
comment: Still early days, yet, so I like how functional the app is off the bat. I'm sure it'll constantly improve over time.

title: Much room for improvement
comment: I'm unable to add a game from within the app, and I have not yet figured out how to sync the app once the game has been added at the web site. These should be very intuitive actions, and hopefully added soon.

title: Collection issue
comment: Does not seem to sync entire collection. other then what I say I own things like wishlist do not sync. have even tried filters and no luck.

title: BGG
comment: I prefer this over the website!
Works great. Still like to be able to add and rate but time fixes all wounds.

title: Superb app
comment: Let's my manage my collection and upload plays. Excellent app.

title: One meeple short
comment: It would be great to have a facility to directly browse a list of a) your own collection and b) your wish list. And then edit / add items.

title: Fantastic!
comment: It's simpler and faster to log your plays through this app than using the actual BoardGameGeek site. I love this app! The user interface beats its parent site. This is a stellar app.

title: No collection management... again
comment: Works well but still no way to add ratings or games to collection

title: Nice app
comment: It's pretty good for tracking your collection and plays. Wish the play stats were better though. Also wish I could see which people I play with have the most wins, most popular teams/colors, etc.
A must if you are a serious board gamer
I use it daily.

title: Missing one feature
comment: Needs a feature to add plays as decimals so I can add expansions as 0.1. Everytime I log a play, I have to go to the website to edit it. Other than that, great implementation and I'm waiting patiently on the feature to edit my collection :)

title: Fast, Useful, Fantastic
comment: Love this app.  For anyone who is on BoardGameGeek, and uses an Android phone, this app is fantastic for viewing your collection, logging plays, and filtering based on various criteria.  The new 5 interface us very slick, but like any change it requires a little adjustment. Nothing bad to say, amazing support to get bugs squashed and features implemented. Love it!

title: Why bother
comment: Fails to log plays and quick plays every time. Cant add games to collection. If i spend more time on the website than the app when I'm out gaming,  the app is not doing its job.

title: Essential for boardgamers
comment: Every gamenight we use this app to settle rules disputes. When thrifting I use this app to check unkown/obscure games before buying.

title: Very Nice App.
comment: Good app, but it is missing some quite a few things, such as adding new games to your collection, and posting to forums.  I know the app is not this website's top priority, but if they added more of the features the site has, I would never go to the site again.  All in all, a great tool for logging plays and getting info on ANY board game you may think about purchasing.

title: Adding plays now sucks
comment: I just want to add players, not get a list of what I'm adding.  Most of that I don't care about.

title: Witty Title
comment: This is a great app that has gotten pretty with the last update. More information is at your fingertips, such as H index, dime and nickel counts. As with so many others the only thing keeping me from giving a 5 is the couple of missing functionalities. I'd also like to see access to lists of dimes or nickels by tapping the respective label, but i want collection modification first.  Keep up the good work!    PS- where can one read up on the disconnect between the play count in Plays and Play Stats?

title: Great app, use all the time.
comment: Yay, no more crashes! Thanks for the quick fix!

title: Wonderful.
comment: Material design update is great even though some things could use a little work; Like the drawer going over the whole screen and I'm still not a fan of the app icon. Other than that the app is functional.

title: All In One
comment: The only downside i have with the app, is that you cant create/reply to forum posts from the app. if yoy could do that... 5 stars.

title: The magic is back
comment: New overhaul is very nice and a lot better to get around in. Still an invaluable tool to help manage the collection. Putting the power of the reference knowledge of the main site in a mobile format is still a valuable asset. Please keep the new features and additions coming.

title: Love the new design
comment: Wow. The makeover has transformed the app into a joy to use.

title: Upgrade
comment: Very nice upgrade

title: Great application
comment: It's almost everything you need on the road with BGG. Record plays, review your collection and its associated forums for quick FAQ, and browse new games to purchase. Only thing missing is ability to follow your subscriptions!

title: Really great!
comment: It's an excellent app, but there's a few functions missing right now that stop it being complete. The ability to add games is sorely missing

title: Handy tool
comment: This app is great at what it does: provide a mobile interface to BGG. Easy to record plays, browse forums, and search for games.

title: Nice app - collection management still missing
comment: Please allow manipulation of user collections. Adding, removing,  rating games would be awesome. Other than that I really like the material design overhaul!
A lot of missing features but a decent start

title: Game tracker
comment: Works great to track plays and collection.

title: Needs much improvement
comment: What's the point of having this app if I can't add a game to my collection?

title: Can't add new games
comment: Cant add new games to my collection. Seems like a basic feature that should be there. 5 stars once added.

title: Suffers from UI design problems
comment: This app is not intuitive. It suffers from UI design issues much like the BGG website. I don't believe it conforms with Android standards and could be greatly improved, in my opinion.

title: Useful
comment: Not easy to narrow search.  Otherwise, easy to read and search. Of course excellent information

title: Good
comment: App functions well but is missing some key features.

title: Lacking features, but still good.
comment: I really wish there were more features and options for me to drill down for specific information about games (like I can on the website) but so far it is the best game in town (hah) and I can at least check board game ratings while I am out shopping.

title: Samsung Galaxy Nexus
comment: Continual synching issues. Logged plays just don't transfer over to BGG.

title: Can't add to collection
comment: That a the only reason I downloaded and it can't be done. Seems like its a pretty basic function that should have been there day 1
Major syncing issues...

title: Solid app, keep adding features!
comment: Great app for viewing games and logging plays. Would love to see some collection management features (add, remove, change state, etc) and some more searchable terms (user, designer, etc). Please keep making improvements and thanks!

It's better than the bgg app, but since the latest update, it crashes a lot and doesn't post to bgg reliably. It also doesn't delete a play from bgg that was deleted on this app. Waiting for full sync capabilities with bgg!!

title: Works great!
comment: Smooth and fast interface. It does miss some features yet, but what is there works brilliant! When they implement some more features it will be an easy 5 star rating.

Great app. I have been recording my plays for over a year and find it fast and easy to enter a play into. Use it to know about hot deals for games on sale and read topics about games using the forum. Still missing some features but one of my most used apps.

title: Great app, a couple of limitations
comment: Love this app. Quick access to my collection, forums, and links to the website. Would like to add to my collection from the app, instead of having to follow through to the full site. Would also like to post to the forum from the app.
Great for logging plays.

title: Error messages all over the place
comment: When I try to sync plays, when I search for a game that's not in my collection, when I record a play... More often than not I get a Java error about a website query being invalid. I've tried deleting my data and resyncing several times, but each time something else breaks after a few uses. I'm getting fed up with this.
Constant notifications about sync errors

title: Not bad, but...
comment: Nice for being able to document a collection, but it would be nice to search the site and add games from the app, not just the site. Add this, and being able to add expansions to the app and it's 5 stars.

title: Limited
comment: Missing a lot of features from the main site. The search is finicky too. A bit disappointing, but useful once in a while.

title: Good app, but...
comment: I still have syncing issues, even after the latest update and being able to modify your collection from the app would be awesome to have.

title: Great app
comment: Wish it had a few more features like the ability to add games or upload photos direct to profile.  At least some better search options like being able to whittle down game selections by multiple flags like player counts and time to play.  What it does,  it does well though.

title: Great for what I use it for.
comment: While it doesn't have everything from the website, it's great for viewing collections and logging plays.

title: Logged plays: no sync
comment: For some reason none of the plays I've logged on the phone app appear on my page... that is the main reason I use the app, to log plays...

title: Does not update anylonger
comment: It worked fine until Lolipop. Then it refuses to update my plays with the site.

title: Great app
comment: Keeps getting better too!

title: not useful for me
comment: It doesn't do the only things I want it to do, namely, adding games to a collection. Very limited app. Hopefully it expands.

title: good for logging and rules searches
comment: Great app to log plays.  Always making good changes. Just wish they would add play count next top the name.

title: Functional
comment: Occasionally has problems, but largely functional and syncs nicely with BGG.

title: A fantastic online resource for gamers.
comment: This is a great web based and mobile app based resource for card gamers, board gamers and just about everybody else. Kudos to the people that put this together. It's allowed fellow gamers to connect easier online and in our local communities to raise awareness and broaden popularity of gaming. Thank you.

title: Lacks key features
comment: I am impatiently awaiting the addition of modifying my collection, viewing subscriptions and geek mail, and posting to forums.

title: ---~~~* A Mataeus Review *~~~---
comment: It's a great app to use when you're out buying a new game and you want to see how it sits in the world rankings, but it suffers from the same problem as the website: It's just not user friendly enough. You can't even add games to your collection. I mean seriously, a big fat button at the side of a game title / picture that says 'Add to your collection' can't be that hard, can it?

title: Great app
comment: Occasionally have syncing issues and this could still use an "add to collection" button when viewing games though. If that were in, it would be 5*

title: Good but not great... Yet.
comment: This app is definitely a must download for any board game player with an interest in keeping up to date with the BGG forums or logging plays for your current board game collection. Also is a very stable program with no crashing to date. It is however missing the ability to update your collection (and a few other options) that have been promised in future updates. At that time it will get a 5 star rating but until then only 4 stars!

title: Great but still
comment: I love the app but it really needs the geek mail!
Really needs collection-management function. Just the ability to flip the "owned" bit would be good enough for me.

title: Record your game play
comment: I use this app to record my gameplay. It's easy to use and really user friendly. Really usefull when I play at a friend's house.   I really hope we can add or modify our collection directly in the app soon.  The search function is hidden in the hotness page, but you can find any game.

title: Wonderful
comment: Just for the small picture icons of My Collection, this is great. Plus there is tons of other info that can be seen at a blink of an eye. *edit* What happened to the Links?

title: Nice but
comment: Pleasr add gamplay gallery as it is on website!!!!!

title: Pictures not showing
comment: Since the update, pictures are not showing in the forums. Please sort it out.
So easy to add plays, I'll be stoked once you can change collection status in the app.

title: Lacking functionality
comment: Can only browse 'the hotness' or search so of no use for game searching. As others gave said need some way of saving games. Mostly needs a much expanded browsing function, by genre, age group, mechanic, rating etc and then to filter and sort as desired. Then it would be very useful. Keep developing!

title: Get Your Geek Fix Anywhere!!
comment: This is an awesome app! On the go, you can stay on top of the forums of the games you love and the new hotness you want to know more about! I can't wait for them to add the ability to update your game library with new games you've purchased. You can't go wrong with this one.
Will be very helpful at hobby shop or second hand stores.

title: Great
comment: It's like a gamer diary. Log your plays, where and with who. You can do most of the things you'd regularly do on bbg, and if you don't have service the play will log once you do. It's a good way to keep track of your collection and remind you of games you should play more to increase your h-index!

title: Almost perfect
comment: Dev, any plans to support reading geeklists or organizing forum posts/articles into different collections like the boxes on the BGG homepage?

title: Great app,  but...
comment: Still waiting for the feature to add games to my collection. Would be useful when I'm out and want to add something that I would like to try.

title: Good but ridiculous
comment: How can you still not add to your collection??  It's been coming soon for way way too long.... Update 11/2014...Still no collection management??

title: Great but not perfect
comment: Still missing a few features like add game but great for tracking plays and reading the forums

title: Great for reviews!
comment: This app I'd lovely if most of what you want to do is get info about a game. Right now, it sucks in terms of managing your personal collection, so I'm waiting for that upgrade on bated breath!

title: Fixed images!
comment: In this version, the images are fixed!  Now I love everything about this app. Great way to keep track of plays.

title: Amazing
comment: Ty

When I updated to newest version, game images would disappear when I clicked on any a game to view it.   I cleared all data and did a full collection sync.  Now all images are gone. Otherwise, I use the app all the time and love it
No way to add to a collection. Really that is the only feature I wanted. :(

title: Step in the right direction
comment: Currently only really useful for tracking plays, if you like to do that. Good looking and running, though. Should become more useful add it's developed. 3 stars for now, but I'm hopeful for this apps future.

title: Just Ok...
comment: Missing quite a lot of features from the website,  the most important one being the ability to view my trades status and initiate new trades.... A small 3 stars at best in its current form,  because it's lacking features...

title: Awsome, but missing somethings
comment: Although it's starting to look really cool, it would be perfect if it included some stats and or achievements.

title: Active development makes me encouraged
comment: It's awesome for logging plays, and it's constantly being improved. I'd like to be able to select players to add, but I like that it remembers who you played with at a given location. Some have also wanted collection management, but it's play data that I'm most concerned about, and this app does it well.
About the only useful function is logging plays. It'd actually easier than the raw website. Other than that...
Great BGG app
Solidly useful!

title: Sign in after reboot
comment: I love this app, but the last update causes app to forget login credentials every time I restart the device. Fix this and add ability to add games to collection for my 5 stars. Searching forums would be great too. Thanks!

title: Great App
comment: Very useful and the devs fix stuff!

title: Updated review
comment: Works great. Would love to post to forums from app.

title: Adding game to collection missing
comment: Still not possible to add a game to your collection from the app. Well crafted otherwise, just missing that one (easy) thing. Rather surprising that it's still not there!
After update constant sync error.
Could use more functionality, but it is a great way of recording plays and quickly looking up games.

title: Great app
comment: New design is beautiful. App is working without any problems.

title: Clunky, but useful
comment: very clunky, very unclear UI.  But it can get the job done. It's the only thing that lets me do BGG stuff on my phone. It gets bonus stars for completeness. there's a lot of things you can do in the app. More than I would expect.

title: Use this app all the time.
comment: Would love to see features on the not-yet list implemented, especially adding to collection. Search by barcode scanner a-la Goodreads would be phenomenal. Thanks for this app, I use it a lot :)

title: Getting better
comment: Would/will give 5 stars if/when rpggeek is added.

title: If you are having sync errors ...
comment: Go into your Android settings -> Apps and find the Boardgamegeek app. Clear cache, then Clear data. The start the app, go into the app settings ->Synchronisation -> Full game sync. This fixed the errors I was seeing in the notification bar on both a Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1  tablet and a HTC One M7 phone.

title: Great potential
comment: Good start, but can improve a lot. Fix the game ratings, they don't match the website.

title: I
comment: J

I work in a comic book and game shop and this app is such a life saver. I'm a huge board game fanatic but I can't know every detail about the hundreds of games we carry. And this gives me all the info I need at my finger tips.

title: Good
comment: You like it, you need it. It's good.

title: It's the only option right now
comment: It's mostly good, but the wishlist of missing features would make the app great. Notifications for Geekmail and viewing/replying would be super helpful.
Awesome

title: Excellent
comment: This app rocks, please keep working it!

title: 4.7.3 Still crashes frequently. Completely unusable.
comment: 4.7.2 Crashes every time I search for a game
Superb

title: Fine
comment: Adding a board game to your collection is a much needed feature though.

title: Good at what it does
comment: Different people will use this app for different things - I'm not using it for forums etc but simply as a way to log plays on games days, conventions and the like.  It works well doing that for games in my collection but I haven't yet figured out if it's possible to log other people's games that I've just played for the first time.
Forum access fixed with 4.7.3 :)

title: Good, but there's a problem.
comment: I like the app, but it won't let me go back to the main page. I use the back button on my phone, or the top left corner to go back, and it exits the app. I've tried rebooting and force stopping the app, but it continues to happen. I guess my next step is to clear data or reinstall, but neither should be necessary.

title: Crashes
comment: Crashes now
Terrible design. Unintuitive.

title: Good but needs to do more.
comment: Very limited . Can't even rate a game.

title: A great tool for using BGG
comment: This program is just handy. It is great if you want to browse the forums to look up rules questions or record plays. It is actually much easier to record a play using this than at a computer.

title: BoardGameGeek to go
comment: It's so great being able to use  the app to log your plays and also read the forums. I wish we were able to reply via the app but the web but to. That opens your browser is handy for that.

title: Why?
comment: The new permissions?  And it would be great to browse through the content of the website instead of pure searching.

title: Almost fantastic!
comment: Needs the ability to add a game to collection, but it is support useful anyway.

title: Still crashes
comment: It still crashes when I open, but for a hobbyists product, I appreciate their hard work.
Excellent app

title: Please add the possibility of commenting in forums
comment: Pretty good, but I can't believe the option of commenting in the forums doesn't exist. Seems like such a obvious thing. Love what you guys (and galls) are doing though. Good job bringing the world information about boardgames!

title: Quick and usefull
comment: When i buy a new game, I usually use the app to see the ranting and the comment of a game. Still need a bit of work but it is pratical
I really wish the forums were more accessible with this app. At least be able to post and sort them a bit better. Also, I'd love to get subscription updates pushed.
Love this app!!

title: Crashes
comment: Thanks fir the hard work, but since the last update it crashes each time I try to see forums.

title: Crashes often
comment: Since the latest update the app has repeatedly crashed when trying to open forum threads. Currently unusable, let's hope it's fixed soon!

title: Needs some work, great concept.
comment: Well, I love the core concept of this app, but I cannot sync more than one geekbuddy. I've tried several methods of logging off on, clearing cache, reinstalling, and everything else, but it doesn't seem to work. This will get more stars when it syncs well.   All of the previous crashes are gone, however. So not all is bad.
Wish you could search top games  If I'm missing it sorry

title: Now with fewer crashes :)
comment: This app was working fine until the last update - now crashes on start up  Please fix and I will submit a new review.
Love it
Love the app, all the vast information of BGG at your fingertips!

title: Great partner app for games!
comment: Thank you for the recent update, it now deserves 5 stars, specifically because of this:  'A play started within 2 hours of the previous play ending is part of the same session'  Makes logging plays in a gaming session so much easier!!
Whoops
Better than the website

title: Great app
comment: The crashing was fixed and the app is back to it's greatness again. Now if it could allow me to add things to my collection that'd be great.

title: Force Close
comment: Instantly force closes on open after update. Was great when it worked.  Update: works great again thanks for the quick fix

title: Works most of the time
comment: I use this all the time, mostly to record plays. Tracking the time automatically is nice, but it can be a bit buggy at times, making me lose the recorded play.

title: Excellent
comment: No more crashing after the latest update. Back to being an excellent way to look up games and log plays on the go.

title: Very useful tool
comment: I hope one day it will allow collection editing from within the app
Fixed
Great way to read the BGG forums.

title: Great way to view the Geek.
comment: Great app!

title: Well done
comment: Fairly solid app. I do wish I could add things to my collection. Also I would like to be able to browse games sorted by average rating or something of that nature. It seems that the only way to browse games without typing in a specific title is to look at the hotness, which tends to be full of unreleased games.

title: The real reason for the Internets
comment: The site that has singlehandedly both cost me the most and saved me the most money. The reason for the Internet's.

title: Great*
comment: Very fast fix since last update. Appreciate the efficiency! Good job!
Great app.  You guys fixed the crashing problem after the last update quickly.  Good job.
Stopped working after my update. Will change once this app is fixed.
Instant crash on s5.
Force close after update

title: Can't be open
comment: Application can't be opened after update.

title: The best way to track your games, but still not quite complete.
comment: While this app has gotten better you still can't track your collection fully, and have to result to using the web to manage it.

title: Love it!
comment: I love this app, I mainly use it for recording plays. I would love a feature to save recurring players and their relevant info (possibly even usual player color) just to make adding plays that much faster.

title: Great start
comment: This app is a great start on mobile accessibility to BGG. It will easily make 5 stars as features are added.

title: 5 estrelas
comment: Muito boa aplicação !

title: Awesome work!
comment: Hoping to one day be able to modify my collection from the app!  Would be hella cool to manage trades too!   Thanks for an amazing job so far! !

title: Good, but needs more
comment: This is a decent app but its definitely not a substitution for visiting the site itself. The ability to upload a play is nice, but ultimately I would love for each game's profile to look more like on the site itself, and be able to view and upload pictures through the app. As it its currently, it's still worth downloading.

title: Very handy.
comment: It's easier and faster for me to record plays through the app than it is through the website.

title: So so
comment: Needs more of the site functionality.

title: Handy for my hobby
comment: With this app I can log my plays, check the site forums for threads and others. It would be fantastic if you can also write posts and upload images from this app.

title: Handy!
comment: Love the ability to record plays! Much easier than using the main site.

title: Good for what it is.
comment: It doesn't have huge capabilities, but it is very convenient for logging plays. Force closes when trying to look at geek buddy's plays.

title: Needs more
comment: App needs more functionality to be worth using. Especially mail and trade functionality.

title: It just keeps getting better.
comment: Every update increases this app's value to me.
As close to the definitive reference for board games as there is on the Internet.	Still crashes too easily.

title: It could be more
comment: Great for logging plays but not super useful for finding bgg scores fast or choosing what game to play.
Needs ability to post in forums
Love the things it can do, but wish I could add to my collection through it as well.
Simple but great

title: My Most Used BGG Feature Missing
comment: No adding to collection option?

title: Syncing doesn't work
comment: "column game_id is not unique (code 19)". Obviously some sort of SQL problem.  Also, it would be nice if the app worked on the sibling sites as well (RPG Geek and Video Game Geek).

title: Good app
comment: Nice and useful, shame one can't add games to a collection using the app though.

title: Something I always wanted.
comment: I love having easy access to my collection and loging plays. The other features dont impress me much yet. But I give it four fir just what I get now. My only gripe is logged plays through tgey app dont post to twitter. Let me know if there is asetting I need change for this and it is five stars easy.

title: Best app for tracking boardgame plays
comment: Really good app for submitting plays to BGG. Beats iOS implementation out of the water.

title: Imprescindible
comment: Al menos para jugones

title: Very crashy
comment: Nice to have info on the go, but I always have to search twice because the first search makes the app crash 100% of the time.

title: Does not work on Nexus 4 kitkat
comment: Please update soon, would love to use this to record plays. It installed fine but after first sync crashed and now won't open at all.

title: Force close, force close, force close
comment: This app runs like crap on the note 3. Leaving the app and reopening = force close. Searching hotness = force close. Then if you try to report it will go to spanish. I think you need to find a geek to fix your app.
Great tool for access to info.  If looking for suggestions, it would be great if when reading about a game there was a button that tells you (and allows you install) if an app version is available.
Crashes Often

title: A very good app.
comment: Great job in bringing the most important aspects of a busy website to an app without making it unwieldy.  I hope to be able to add thumbs at some point.

title: Perfect
comment: I wanted something to record plays better and this program does it absolutely perfect!!! Thank you!!

title: Better in previous version
comment: New version not as good. Doesn't inform you of your play count when logging plays. More difficult to log plays in general. Layout is much less pleasing and creates a wall of text look.

title: Updates stopped working
comment: Sometime over the last couple weeks, game play updates stopped working... just says "pending" and never does.  Rating dropped again until fixed

title: Only good for games I own.
comment: It works somewhat for games I own or have played before but with this most recent update, I can find now way to enter plays for games I don't own. I've never been able to get the "top 100" games either  on all of bgg or for a category.  Why "The Hotness" has (had?) a button and the top 100 doesn't, I have no idea.  The iPhone app works great while the android app is barely usable.

title: Crashes. Cant log play
comment: An already bad application (so far only useful to log plays fast) after the last update has becoma useless. Crashes all the time and trying to log lasts forever...

title: More features needed and frequently fails to update info
comment: There seems no way to add new games to your collection from the app and the collection from the website doesn't sync perfectly either.

title: Recommended Players?
comment: The recommended number of players data is something I use all the time on the 'geek. Is there a logistical reason that information isn't included within the app? Hope to see it added soon. Great app, otherwise!

title: Can't record play
comment: I log in, try to record play, it logs me out, Never records the play. I've tried signing out and back in multiple times.

Logging out while recording plays was a known issue with version 4.4 of the application. If you upgrade to 4.4.1, the issue should be resolved. In fact, your unlogged plays should sync after signing in. This may require signing out first. Thanks for the feedback.

title: OK for Browsing; Needs More Features
comment: Good for tracking your collection and plays. OK for browsing forums. Lacks any way to read new subscription posts which is what I mostly do on BGG.

title: Great looking would like more features.
comment: The new Holo theme is really nice and makes the app easier to use. The text us still too wide on tablets though, and can be hard to read. Also it would be nice to see pics and videos of the games.  These are minor niggles though, however it does force close on me sometimes which is a more serious problem.  Edit: Serious bugs with new version. I'm logging them on the bug tracker.

title: Great work.
comment: Thanks for making this guys!  Haters: its an enthusiast site, not a commercial paid app, you can always write a better app.

title: Very nice.
comment: Excellent app for getting info from the Board Game Geek website.  Thank you for all your hard work.

title: Lame
comment: So useless. Icons are not clear or intuitive. Its basically a play clocker.

title: Nice
comment: All it needs now is the ability to add games to your collection, then it would be perfect!

title: Featureless
comment: Desperately needs an advanced search and sort/filter options. People use this as a game checker while they at the game store, a global top 100 doesn't do anyone any good without sorts and filters.

title: Doesn't sync
comment: New comments:  doesn't sync.  All my logged plays have been sitting in my phone.  Had to delete my login several times.   Old comments: Great for logging game plays also.  Very useful.  It's a lot better than the iphone app.  I have both.
Like this app helps me log game play a ton easier then the website itself on a mobile device.

title: Buggy, Not enough features
comment: Tends to crash when I view a game that I don't have in my collection. And I wish I could read and send PMs, and view my subscriptions!

title: A great website but not with this client
comment: all the functions i would like to use are not implemented and it is just for logging your games a good tool.

title: Plays no longer syncing
comment: I just realized the app is no longer syncing plays. Lost a lot of data..
No longer syncing plays?

title: Plays don't update
comment: Everything else is excellent. Plays don't update since 3/29/2013...

title: A must have for any geek!
comment: A great app!

title: Stalls and takes forever 90% of the time.
comment: I can't look-up games with this.  It stalls, sits for 2-3 minutes...then I give-up and use my browser.

title: Mega useful app
comment: I love board games, and BGG has become a hub for my board game life. I'd love a personalised forum view though.

title: Great improvement!
comment: Good update from the previous version. Just wondering, how do you browse to the later posts in the forums?

title: Excellent
comment: Great update! Would still love to see specific 7" tablet layout, browsing pics, and add/remove game from your collection.

title: Great, but could use some more features
comment: Great app for logging plays, looking up games and checking the forums. Missing: - the wargame forum - reply to threads - managing collection

title: Very useful
comment: The new update looks great,  is there an image gallery view in the works?

title: Great app
comment: The update is clean and works well. Only downsides I have noticed are 1) we still can't use it to post on the forums, and 2) like the previous versions, I don't see any way to add games to your collection via the app.   It is really great for tracking plays and checking the forums though!  And it is very pretty. Another feature I would love implemented would be syncing with the notifications on BGG/being able to check our site inbox.  A truly mobile BGG would be amazing!

title: Very good
comment: But there are still some features missing

title: Incomplete
comment: Why can't I add games to my collection??  Ridiculous!
If my friend logs a play it should show up in my plays

title: Useful
comment: A little bit is missing compared to my iPhone version but it is a must for any board game fan.

title: Handy for rules lookups
comment: Being able to browse forums allows rule question lookups and browsing your collection is easy. It'd be nice to be able to add games to collection and post on forums, but still a good app!

title: Good start
comment: Needs to show gallery for games page and also fix collection views. Would be nice to allow you to record play info and perhaps even upload pics.

title: Awesome App
comment: Gets better and better with every update... keep up the good work!

title: Good app
comment: Really needs the ability to manage my collection

title: Can't add games to collection, wishlist, etc.
comment: I would give it 5 stars if I could add games to my collection or wishlist. Can't see any good reason why these features aren't included.

title: Good and handy
comment: Need a way to reply and post in forums.
Really great tool. Very convenient.

title: I'm missing a function to see subscribtions
comment: Nice to have a BGG app on my phone, but it would have been nice to check my subscriptions and geekmails from the app too.

title: Love it!
comment: Great for quickly logging game plays without having to find a real computer.

title: Better than the site in a lot of ways
comment: It's just so smooth and crisp! I love this app, must have if you go on BGG at all.

title: BGG!
comment: Great app for recording plays.

title: I miss adding games to my collection
comment: Good app but would indeed like to add games to my collection. Also would it possible to do that with a barcode reader?

title: I love bgg!
comment: Im a bgg junkie & this app is perfect except for the fact i cant send/recieve messages or make trades. Once you can...oh boy!!! :)

title: It would be great if
comment: So far, none of my games shows in the collection menu, also it would be great if I could add a game to my collection with it.

title: usefull tool
comment: Great app, quite useful.

title: Great app!
comment: Great app and great support!

title: Fixed
comment: New version doesn't crash anymore
Best bgg app

title: Great app
comment: You should be able to choose a number of players and be able to exclude expansions in the random game feature.

title: Cant add games
comment: To my collections via this app.

title: Top notch geekery
comment: Excellent resource for all us geeks. I never buy a game without checking the geek first.

title: Ok, but new version acts weird
comment: The previous version worked great. I like the new one better though. But I get an javascript error all the time when its trying to sync my plays. And it sometimes double logs my plays. Hope u guys can fix this

title: Keeps crashing
comment: Crashes as soon as I search/look at a game

title: Best app for BGG, bar none!
comment: Fantastic app, and it just keeps getting better. Regular updates and new features are just icing on the cake!

title: Good but a lot of room for improvement
comment: This app would be 4 stars if you could add games to your collection with it, and 5 stars if you could access the forums from within the app. As it stands now it's a good product that leaves me wishing it would do more than it does.
Outstanding

title: Perfect
comment: Perfect little tool for looking up your collection or a quick game synopsis when you're away from your computer.

title: Great app
comment: Very nice app for viewing your game collection or researching games on the go.

title: Nice
comment: Good easy to use

title: Must have for BGG addicts

comment: Ahhhhhhhhh...

title: Awesome
comment: BGG mobile. Simply marvelous!

title: Quite good

title: I like this...maybe one request...
comment: My request? I would use this app more often if maybe a way to use the bbg bazaar tab was added...and maybe some of the other site features... But so far, good job...I look forward to seeing this one progress...

title: Great for quick access to BGG
comment: Easy to use and great for quickly looking up and logging pages on the geek.

title: Really handy
comment: Great for logging games, needs the ability to add games to collection on the fly.
A lot much faster to access than the browser!

title: Best bgg app
comment: Can you add updating of game library?

title: Sync needs non-manual preference.
comment: Could use a bit more functionality for modifying collection/wish list/etc
Works really well. Would like to have a few more functions and a better search engine, but perfect for on the go reference.

title: Awesome!
comment: What a great app!
Great work on this app,especially with the latest update. I tried this app a year ago and it was terrible, but now it is awesome. Thanks!

title: Good!
comment: And nice new features! Definitely worth installing, and then some.

title: Good
comment: This app is good, but is very limited compared to what is on the web page. Update now allows app to be moved off of device to memory card.

title: Useful
comment: This app is great to have when looking at games in the store. Would be perfect if you could see the list of say the top 100 games.

title: Just what i need
comment: When browsing in the shops.

title: Wonderful labor of love
comment: Now I can rock my bgg addiction on my phone.
Great app. I would like to be able to exclude my expansions from the random game selector but other than that its awesome.
Nice app but would like to be able to add/remove from collection or wishlist.
Forum addition makes this a 5 star app

title: Good, needs some more, easier than going to wesite
comment: Needs support to move off phone to SD. I received a crash when trying to filter my collection, HTC G2 2.3. I submitted an error report

title: Great app
comment: Love this app. Use it all the time. Great to have a list of your collection at your fingertips

title: A lot better.
comment: Huge improvement. It would be amazing if there were forums.
Forum access.

title: Great
comment: Good work! I would like to be able to add a game to my wish list.

title: Awesome
comment: Great reference when in the game store. Love the site and this app!
Since version 3.2 added full details to play logging, this is simply brilliant.
Love the option to log plays with players.

title: Good
comment: Latest update is great improvement
Great app for logging plays. Could use a few extra features like more information about other users, lists and forum.
You can log plays easily and have been able too for months. Only need a way to search forums and it's perfect. Its also easy to navigate.

title: Needs barcode scanner
comment: It really needs a barcode scanner to add games to lists/mark owned/played.
Completely agree with a previous reviewer : very nice and handy , but suffers from comparison with the ios equivalent. Thanks for GPLing it by the way
Almost great...needs to be able to see comments like the bgg iphone app...and a top 100 would be nice too
Nice interface, but there's no way to read comments?
A must for those addicted to BGG...those like me.
Duh...Found links. =) Awesome update! Awesome app!
The new version is fantastic! Collection view, quick play logging... Love it!
Great for logging plays. Would be nice with more functionality.
Great app! Suggested feature: ability to list plays pr date, month or game
The links to the BGG pages were quite useful. I'm sad to see them gone.
Wish it had the functionality of the iPod app - showing/editing my collection.
Needs App2SD, period. Also pretty unusable without access to the forum reviews at least.
Great for looking games up. Needs more to it, like forum browsing.
Not very useful, doesn't render the html properly, would rather use the web browser.
Pretty useful in a boardgame shop. Thanks
Eh.
Works fine. I would like to see the ability to manipulate my collection data. But works great.
Missing some needed features but a great starting point when I'm standing in the game store.
Force close whenever I search a title. Can't use it at all
Good resource
Really need to access profiles and add plays.
Would be better if you could access your profile to record your plays. The iphone one does...
Awesome app for accessing BGG. I too wish there was individual profile access. That would take this app to 5 stars!
Game info/review would be nice.
Pretty good. Would like to be able to login and view my profile/lists/etc.
Great app. Easy to hop right to a games page on BGG to view everything if needed. Much easier than trying to navigate their mobile site.
Fine

So far very good. Keep adding more features
It would be awesome, but it doesnt have all of the games from the site and the layout isnt very good

Works like a charm,indispensible in the boardgameshops :-)

Excellent love the website found many board games i never heard of or havent played in years
